name: Battle Ants by Fun Games For Free
name_original: Battle Ants by Fun Games For Free
description:
Build your own ant colony! Use your skills and wisdom to bring down enemies from backyards all over the world!

Battle Ants is a fun strategy game combined with awesome physics-based action. Grow your colony to make it the most powerful in the whole world!

Breed and train battle ants and get rich by looting your rivals. But remember to protect your own food and water from enemy raids!

Engage in thrilling single and multiplayer missions - and conquer the world!

Features:

- Single- and multiplayer, physics-based action!
- No creativity limit: build an infinite combination of Ant colonies
- Grow faster by robbing resources from other colonies
- Awesome characters
- Highly engaging gameplay!
